TextBlock.Text: NESIA: While Sennetti and Okalis are constructing the <color=orange>lab to study the Dree language</color>, I propose that we construct another lab here to investigate the crystal that floats above our heads.
AZOLLA: I can help you with this, Nesia! I am quite excited to see what secrets the crystal holds. Suppose it has something to do with the gravity of this planet?
NESIA: It may. The material we have sampled from <color=orange>Gravitonâ€™s Folly</color> exhibits only light gravitational properties. It may be possible the crystal strengthens them somehow.
AZOLLA: I imagine this knowledge would be quite useful to future attempts to use this material. I know Sennetti is having to refine large quantities to create the attractive force desired.
